article_title: Olympus hiked device prices amid superbug outbreaks
article_text:

article_metadata.description: Amid an outbreak of antibiotic-resistant superbugs linked to their medical scopes, medical device manufacturer Olympus Corp. hiked prices more than 25 percent, according to Kaiser Health News.

og.description: Amid an outbreak of antibiotic-resistant superbugs linked to their medical scopes, medical device manufacturer Olympus Corp. hiked prices more than 25 percent, according to Kaiser Health News.
og.title: Olympus hiked device prices amid superbug outbreaks
